<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Terrifying Howl](/Feats.aspx?ID=5853) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 82 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You unleash a terrifying howl. Attempt [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) checks to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) each enemy within 30 feet: you don't take a penalty if the creature doesn't understand your language. Regardless of the results of your checks, each target is then temporarily immune to Terrifying Howl for 1 minute.
name: Terrifying Howl
